name: Smiley's Run
overview: A Snake\Worm game published in both 64'er 1991/04, and in 64'er Sonderheft 79. Do you like snakes, do you even like them to eat? That is your task in this game by Jürgen Graser and Lauda-Könlgshofen. The game consists of biscuits imprisoning eight snakes. Your smiley (bottom right) must now try to eat all the snakes. However, this is only possible for him. y/when he has eaten all the cookies beforehand. Then he can carefully approach the reptile and nibble on it from behind. But beware, the animals are extremely agile! Smiley is controlled with the joystick in port 2. If he finds himself in a snake's stomach, just press the fire button to start again. Bon appetit and don't spoil your stomach!
